questiontext.text:
A cube of side {#aa#} is made of laminated material so that, with the origin at one corner, the density of the material is \(kx\).

  1. Find the mass \(M\) of the cube: [[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]][[feedback:prt1]]
  2. Find the position of the centre of mass of the cube (input as list): [[input:ans2]] [[validation:ans2]][[feedback:prt2]]
  3. Finally find the moments of inertia about the \(x\)-, \(y\)- and \(z\)-axes (input as list in terms of M): [[input:ans3]] [[validation:ans3]][[feedback:prt3]]

prtcorrect.text: Correct answer, well done.

prtpartiallycorrect.text: Your answer is partially correct.

prtincorrect.text: Incorrect answer.

qtest.description: Test case assuming the teacher's input gets full marks.
